bwwExcerpt: To be clear, the production, directed and choreographed from the inception by multi-Tony Award winner Jerry Mitchell ("La Cage aux Folles," "Kinky Boots"), is visually resplendent, outstandingly danced and sung with shiver-inducing gorgeousness. And it's got a major star in Adam Pascal, of "Rent" fame, whose rock 'n' roll voice is arresting in its power and expressivity. Altria Theater - Richmond, VA Tony Farrell, Richmond Times-Dispatch: Songs that offer lines and wordplay not especially invent
